citations.narrative:
There is an incomplete record of every adult dog having received the distemper, parvovirus, Bordetella, and Rabies
vaccines since 2021. Distemper, parvovirus, and Rabies are viruses that can cause infected dogs stress, discomfort, pain,
or even death. Bordetella is a bacteria that can cause respiratory disease. The current Program of Vet Care prescribes
the distemper/parvovirus and Bordetella vaccines yearly and the Rabies vaccine every 1-3 years (depending on age and
vaccine status of the dog) in adult dogs. Vaccinations for contagious and/or deadly diseases such as distemper,
parvovirus, Bordetella, and Rabies must be given in accordance with the Program of Vet Care. Correct by following the
vaccination plan for adult dogs in the Program of Vet Care and update vaccines. Correct by: May 1, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.13(a)(3) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
There is an incomplete record of every adult dog having received the distemper, parvovirus, Bordetella, and Rabies 
vaccines since 2021. Distemper, parvovirus, and Rabies are viruses that can cause infected dogs stress, discomfort, pain, 
or even death. Bordetella is a bacteria that can cause respiratory disease. The current Program of Vet Care prescribes 
the distemper/parvovirus and Bordetella vaccines yearly and the Rabies vaccine every 1-3 years (depending on age and 
vaccine status of the dog) in adult dogs. Vaccinations for contagious and/or deadly diseases such as distemper, 
parvovirus, Bordetella, and Rabies must be given in accordance with the Program of Vet Care. Correct by following the 
vaccination plan for adult dogs in the Program of Vet Care and update vaccines. Correct by: May 1, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
